桏字的基本解释

桏
qióng
古书上说的一种树。
柜柳。

桏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qióng］
［《廣韻》渠容切，平鍾，羣。］
木名。《说文·木部》：“桏，椶椐木也。”朱骏声通训：“許云椶椐，疑楥椐之誤，是桏一名楥椐也。”一说即柜柳。

桏字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　桏； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页525第16
【唐韻】【集韻】?渠容切，音蛩。【說文】椶椐木。【廣韻】柜柳也。【管子·地員篇】高陵土山，其木乃桏。椶原从木从署作，依《段注》改爲椶。

桏字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
桏字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树。柜柳。

桏
Basic explanation of words
桏
qióng
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
Cabinet willow.
桏
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qióng］
["Guangyun" Qu Rongqie, Pingzhong, Qun. ]
Wooden name. "Shuowen·Mubu": "King, chucking wood." Zhu Junsheng through training: "Xu Yun chucking, suspecting the mistake of chubing, is a chubby." One said it is a willow.
桏
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　桏; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 525 16
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Qu Rong cut, sound cricket. [Said the text] Hulunmu. [Guang Yun] Willow in the cabinet. [Guanzi·Diyuan Chapter] Gaoling Tushan, its mummy. It was written by Mu Cong Shuyuan and was changed to Shun according to "Duan Zhu".
桏
